moves.1. d4 d5 2. Nc3: An unusual response.  More common: c4
moves.4. Bd2: Consider going ahead with development: e3 or Bg5.
moves.6... Nc6: No. How about Ne4. Nc6 lets White exchange and doubles your pawns.
moves.13. e4: Better a4. Or Qe2. BUILD tension.
moves.14. Bxe4 Nxe4 15. Qxe4 Bb7 16. Qg4 Qd5 1: ?  How about Rfe1.  What is h3 about?
moves.17... a5: How about f5 instead?  This just loses a pawn.
moves.18. bxa5 Ba6: Just gets WHite's rook where it should have been anyway.
moves.20... Qxd4: Blunder.  Someone wasn't using Analyze and Flip.
